scripts.create-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/pangoro
scripts.remove-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/pangoro
scripts.deploy-pangoro-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangoro subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 s2sBacking/pangoro
scripts.create-darwinia-local: cp subgraph.yaml.darwinia subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/darwinia
scripts.remove-darwinia-local: cp subgraph.yaml.darwinia subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ s2sBacking/darwinia
scripts.deploy-darwinia-local: cp subgraph.yaml.darwinia subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 s2sBacking/darwinia
